title: Ticket #2161: "executable" in submit file for Condor-C to Condor-VM-universe
description:
condor_submit has special logic for handling the "executable" line when submitting to the VM universe. For the VM universe, it is not fatal if the executable actually exists - it's just a placeholder.

If using condor-c to condor VM universe, this logic is not invoked. If you leave out "executable" or feed it a placeholder, condor_submit refuses to work.

The desired behavior is that if universe = grid and grid_resource = condor* and remote_universe = vm, then the executable should not be required.
creator: bbockelm
